name: Project Z (Zank)
description:
Project Z is a student project for my university and a 3D Platformer. You play a ball and have to go through 6 levels, avoid 4 enemy types and collect pink leafs. Can you get all 128 leafs in less than 5 minutes?

You can play with keyboard and mouse or with a Playstation 4 controller.

The game got a DevLog with 6 videos on YouTube.
